signature: Response createAllocationResponse(Request, TransportAddress, TransportAddress, byte[], int)

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require setting up a response with specific attributes related to transport addresses and transaction IDs.
Both methods involve creating responses with attributes related to transport addresses.
The createAllocationResponse method is typically invoked in response to an allocate request, making it crucial to test the method in conjunction with createAllocateRequest.
The createAllocationResponse method may be invoked after a binding request, especially in scenarios involving ICE processing.
